project.title: Logs App
project.subtitle: Mobile monitoring
body: Designed to allow users to quickly access their logs on mobile devices, this app could be used by on call engineers to enhance incident response and resolution time.

The goals is to allow users to view their latest logs, filter and search them, select relevant time timeframes and timezone and hopefully, help said users to quickly locate the offending hosts or containers and get services back up and running.

project.title: ON AIR
project.subtitle: Tangible music
body: A music platform where user own individual tracks, these are 'printed' in a limited quantity on various formats such as Compact cassette or Minidisc.Tracks can be used to create mixtapes which can be lent/gifted to other users, or even exported to their corresponding physical formats.
Each track is link to non-fungible token (NFT) to ensure its authenticity. The quality of the audio may depend on the chosen format.

project.title: Chrome Mobile
project.subtitle: Focus on reachability
body: Experimenting with a few components for a hypothetical fork of the chromium browser on mobile, mainly focused on improving reachability
The search bar is brought down to the bottom of the screen, as well as the navigation keys and contextual actions to make sure that users can browse even when using their phone one handed.

project.title: La Martingale
project.subtitle: Mobile App
body: La martingale is the companion App to a set of worksheets designed to help medical students Pass the French ECNi exam.
The app allows flexible access to the knowledge base, both on Android and iOS, thanks to codes printed in each copy of the book. Feel free to check it out on App stores !
